title: Flyingjack123
author: Flyingjack123
content: I came to know about bitcoin somewhere in December 2021. When it was hovering around 50,000 USD.  I read about its story from how Satoshi started the project to bitcoin pizza and more.  I felt inspired. I decided to learn more about it and joined the forum with the same intention.Over period of time i learnt things from crypto-wallets to crypto-exchanges. I learnt how bitcoin gained value and what are its benifits.I also learnt about the flood of altcoins in the market, and how they are rising and falling overnight. Giving people chance to gamble and make fortune.However to me bitcoin always felt special, because while projects fizzle out now and than, bitcoin has steadily been the corner stone of cryptoworld.Also maybe i joined this forum, may be this naturally enhanced my trust in bitcoin.I am not an avid investor. I invest small amounts now and than in bitcoin, and intend to not to touch my investment atleast this decade. I hope by then it will grow to a respectable sum.While lot of people off late were saying that bitcoin is finally doomed to fall. Recently my trust in bitcoin has substantially increased because of the  way it held its value against market forces . While all the currencies including euro and yen, showed a steep drop against dollar. The share marked saw a fall. Bitcoin held its ground.Against all the naysayers against all the government bans and restrictions, bitcoin managed to hold. I believe it has proven its mettle.I believe soon bitcoin will rise and shoot to the stars..Waiting for that to happen.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Bitcoin has always been around whenever the market condition is not fine. Bitcoin has witnessed the birth and death of many altcoins and shitcoins yet he has remained unshakable. It is a good idea that you want to invest in Bitcoin, I commend your courage, bur leaving your investment for a decade is a way too far . 10 years is not today and nobody knows what actually will happen in the next two years let alone in the next 10 years. How rich are you that you will not be needing your investment until 10yrs time?

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: I guess that's part of the natural evolution, I mean when people says that a certain invention is going to fall and it will be doom, guess what, it will go the other way around. Just like in the beginning, yes many people invested on bitcoin but sell early because they think it's going to die. And majority of them are not regretting their decision to sell early because bitcoin really took off in the last 10 years or so. Not to late to invest right now, the price is very cheap so take advantage of this situation.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: OP from your point of view I can see that you cherish Bitcoin and you are also a good investor for you to invest on Bitcoin for a decade. You will reap from the fruit of your labour because its a long term investment but I hope you don't get discouraged later to sell your Bitcoin Holdings.A time will becoming when Bitcoin price will shoot high and so many investors will keep their Holdings. No amount is too small or big in Bitcoin investment, the important thing is that you have invested and have some MBTC. People that says Bitcoin will die are those that don't understand Bitcoin concept. In all cryptocurrency, Bitcoin has survived and spread rapidly  amongst other no matter the economy challenges the world is facing.

comments.author: jokers10
comments.body: If to consider Bitcoin only as an investment asset you can believe it will grow or not to believe in that. But Bitcoin is much more than just an investment asset, it is an idea of returning of control on own money, it is an idea of automated decentralized decisions working for financial markets (instead of old bank system) and then for many more social or governmental systems. And if we look at Bitcoin with a larger angle we can see it already gave us lots of opportunities and will work for better future non depending on the BTC/USD rates.

comments.author: Hypnosis00
comments.body: Well, we all have reasons why we are here and why we believe in Bitcoin. But there is one thing in common and that is because we see Bitcoin as a profitable investment more than any cryptocurrencies in the market. Honestly, interest has been built up upon seeing on the news, social media ads, and of course, coming from the forum. I know doubts are what we feel at the start but it has changed as time passes by. I would say good to you who see it as an opportunity but I have to say that never consider this as a forever asset.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Your not wrong to have a firm hope in bitcoin. Still u wouldn't compare bitcoin with Yen, Euro and other stocks out there. Bitcoin is unique and even in the crypto world being the pioneer cryptocurrency from which all alts sterns from. The value of bitcoin cannot be over emphasised and the fact that it continues to defy all odds the government and the critics have set against it projects it for how long its willing to stay.Regulations remains one of the chief issues with the government else tbu don't deny it for being a currency with some good standards.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: I first learned about Bitcoin in 2013-14. I was a clueless teenager back then, with no access to exchanges or a way to acquire Bitcoin. Admittedly, I was on the scene relatively early, seeing that it was worth as little as $200. Honestly, I've seen Bitcoin plummet and recover numerous times, and especially after the large market crash in late 2017, I'm more confident than ever. As long as you're patient enough, you'll have a good chance of making a successful investment. Also, don't compare Bitcoin with fiat currencies, it's no use. While they're both currencies, they share very little similarities. It'd be more sensible to compare it with gold rather than EUR or USD.Welcome to the Bitcoin world. I wish you the best.
